caption.p: Effect of sequential ( a, b) and combined ( c, d) treatment with short photoperiod and temperature on the expression of selected ( a, c) flowering time genes, FT1, AP1, AGL14 and LFY, and ( b, d) branching inhibitory genes, BRC1 and MAX1. a, b Expression in terminal buds (TB), and in young axillary buds (AXB) after zero, three and six weeks chilling (5 °C). Plants at point zero (no chilling) were dormant after six weeks of short photoperiod. c, d Expression in young axillary buds after a 6-week period at the indicated temperatures (day/night): moderate (18/18 °C), moderate/low (18/12 °C) and low (12/12 °C). (values are means ± SE, n = 6 per data point)
